    • Method Detail

      • zipUpload

        @Transactional(rollbackFor=java.lang.Throwable.class)
@RequestMapping(value="/zips",
                method=POST)
public void zipUpload(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                                   @RequestParam(value="archive")
                                                                   org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile requestFile,
                                                                   @RequestParam(value="force_reingest",required=false)
                                                                   String forceReingest)
               throws IOException,
                      org.ambraproject.filestore.FileStoreException
        Create an article based on a POST containing an article .zip archive file.

        TODO: this method may never be used in production, since we've decided, at least for now, that we will use the ingest and ingested directories that the current admin app uses instead of posting zips directly.

        Parameters:
        response - response to the request
        requestFile - body of the archive param, with the encoded article .zip file
        forceReingest - if present, re-ingestion of an existing article is allowed; otherwise, if the article already exists, it is an error
        Throws:
        IOException
        org.ambraproject.filestore.FileStoreException
